body.name: Steam Cleaner, Handheld Steamer for Cleaning, Multipurpose Pressurized Steam Cleaners for Home Use with Continuous Steam Lock, Unlimited Use Time and 11 Accessory Kit to Remove Grime, Grease
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Limitless Use Time & Add Water Anytime】400ml large water level visible tank. Add water anytime during use to make it last infinitely. The SXHY Upgrade Steamer eliminates the need to wait 3 minutes for the boiler to cool down and then add water, as well as the need to add water and then heat it up for 5 minutes before it can be used. Saves time, can be used all the time and makes cleaning even large areas a breeze.

【Hands-free Steam Cleaning】The unique steam lock button frees up your hands from having to hold the trigger all the time during steam cleaning, no more constant force and no more hand fatigue. Press the lock button, then press and hold the steam button. Then release your hand and wait about 10 seconds for the steam to come out automatically!

【Powerful Hot Steam, Chemical Free & Safe】SXHY Steam Cleaner heats to produce 230°F (110°C) high temperature steam to clean grime, dust, grease, and more. Make your home as good as new. 100%chemical-free with no harmful fumes or residue. Includes a safety lock on the handle for added peace of mind for your safety. It can be used with confidence around children and pets.

【Save Time and Effort】: Steamer only needs to heat water to work, without complicated tools and tedious operations. It doesn't even need to be cleaned multiple times, so it's easy to get the cleaning done and gives you more free time.

【11-piece Accessory Set】: SXHY Handheld Steam Cleaner does an amazing job of cleaning and ironing. Plus 11-piece accessory kit such as: angled nozzle, Soft pipe, nozzle with brush, fabric steamer tool, rubber wiper for window/door, and many other extras. It’s all-purpose and can go and clean out any hard to reach gaps, corners, angles, and also various surfaces/materials: kitchen sink, countertop, toilet, BBQ grill, shower curtains, floor, kids’ toy, pet mattress, sofa, car, and clothing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hands-free Steam Cleaning: The unique steam lock button frees up your hands from having to hold the trigger all the time during steam cleaning, no more constant force and no more hand fatigue. Feel doubly at ease.
Limitless Use Time & Add Water Anytime: 400ml large water level visible tank. Add water anytime during use to make it last infinitely. Cleaning even large areas becomes a breeze.

Multipurpose Steam Cleaners for Home Use, Save Time and Effort Big nozzle + brush Cleans grease, dust and stains from the kitchen. Big nozzle Clean oil, dust, dirt and sludge from cars. Big nozzle+Glass brush Steam cleans and squeegees flat surfaces like windows, glass and mirrors. Big nozzle+Flate brush Cleans doorways, window cracks, wall cracks and other hard-to-reach recesses.

Soft pipe Easily cleans toilets and removes odors. Brush+Big noxxle+Ironing towel Clean and remove fabric folds, such as clothes, curtains and sofas. 16.4FT/5M Long Power Cord Extra long power cord to go farther, easy to move around and cover more work area. Steam Lock The steam lock allows steam to come out automatically, eliminating the need to keep your finger on the steam button. No more tired fingers.

Principle of operation When the oil or dirty thing meet high temperature, it will easy drop from the surface. So do not let the nozzle or accessories leave target too far. The steam will become cold and can not clean well. Pleasc let the nozzle close for 5-10mm from the target that you want to clean. 11-piece Accessory Set It’s all-purpose and can go and clean out any hard to reach gaps, corners, angles, and also various surfaces/materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a handheld multipurpose steamer and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The steamer comes with numerous attachments that make it easy to use for a variety of applications. I have used it to clean my kitchen counters, bathroom tiles, and even my car’s upholstery. The steamer is very easy to use and the attachments are simple to switch out. It is also very lightweight and easy to maneuver.I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a versatile and effective cleaning tool. It is definitely worth the money and has made cleaning so much easier and more efficient. If you’re in the market for a new handheld steamer, this one is definitely worth considering!Just be careful of the hot steam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, Easy-to-use steamer
reviews.reviewText: I've never had any need for a handheld steamer until I discovered my indoor cats had picked up fleas. To my utter and complete horror, fleas had infiltrated the upstairs of my home. After trying various insecticides, laying down diatomaceous earth powder, setting flea traps, I eventually decided that I had had enough of taking a passive approach to eliminating them - I wanted to seek and destroy. And so, I purchased this handheld steamer/steam cleaner.I believe it is pretty straightforward and simple to use. Unfortunately, you cannot press down the trigger at will to shoot out steam. There is a push-down safety tab which locks the steamer in the 'on' position until you are ready to stop steaming. Then you would press down on the safety tab again to release. The temp and air pressure at which it dispenses steam is very effective for completely disintegrating fleas, eggs, larvae...where ever they may be hiding. It has a fairly large reservoir for water. It is able to steam clean all around the borders of a smallish room (~100 square feet) without having to reload. It comes with every attachment you may ever need. I also thought the design was way sleeker than anything else I had come across on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little device for chemical free cleaning!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My family recently moved into an older home and needless to say there was a lot of cleaning and preparation to get it in a clean and livable state for our family. This steamer helped us so much. We were able to get most of the tough stains in the grout and window seals without the use of harsh chemicals and cleaners. It made cleaning so simple and easy. I just ran the steamer, which also blasted out all of the tough to get edges, and went behind with a dry rag to wipe up the debris. Super simple and super effective. It also heats up in less than 30 seconds which made refilling and getting back to cleaning quick and easy. I always grab this first now and have found myself hardly using any cleaning products. I have also used to to lift stickers, I have a toddler, off of places that would otherwise leave marks and residue. It makes it super easy. I am able to steam my clothes instead of pulling out my iron. It also has many attachments that make the job much easier. It is my new favorite cleaning device. I highly recommend. It does spit a small amount of water while the steam is coming to temp but it resolves in about ten seconds once the steam is flowing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy and cleans tough jobs
reviews.reviewText: Great product it has great steam pressure very versatile and I like all the attachments. Very easy to use I used it in my bathroom on my shower tile it works great on mirrors I used it also on my oven easy to take out and use and very easy to put away in store. Glad I got the product it's definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Love this. It works so well I knew the grout was dirty but didn’t realize how dirty. So easy to add water even when cleaning. Love that the machine doesn’t have to cool down. The attachments are great and work so well. I love that I don’t have to keep holding the trigger and that the machine stays on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Purchase - a wonderful surprise
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this steamer. We had heard of the steam cleaners by word of mouth. The word was - steam cleaners are a cleaning dynamo. How true. Based on what people were telling us and the reviews on Amazon we decided to buy one. The selection of steamers is quite large so how did we pick this one. It was the longer cord and greater water capacity.I would guess the steamer has been used for over twenty hours now as we do grout, faucets, slate and glass. Sometimes the simplest things make a big difference in your life. Like a vacuum everyone should have a steam cleaner. This SXHY has been a great purchase. If feels safe, has numerous attachments and work consistently each time. I am sure all steam cleaners produce a steam cleaning action, it is basic in concept, but the longer cord and capacity are the buying standouts. When home the best thing is the consistent and the attachments that look to be quite durable. This item is a household utensil everyone should have.It is the season and rain and wind, come spring I will put it to use on bikes, cars and even outside item. The only downside is when one notices that the steam cleaner really cleans things that appeared to be quite clean. The unit is worth it just to clean the stove, oven and other kitchen appliances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I clean houses for a living...I'm a little meticulous about it lol. I tried it on my shower tiles first.. it did a great job! I felt they were actually clean...no soap residue...which I hate! I used the soft pipe (the long hose attachment) the window brush & the ironing towel on the tiles. I also sanitized my toilet. I cleaned all the attachments after with just soap and water...very easy to clean up. After I dried my ironing towel I wanted to see if it would take the wrinkles out of my curtain as you can see.. it did! I will be using this a lot...it does a wonderful job and is easy to go from one thing to the next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not heat up
reviews.reviewText: I followed the instructions exactly yet product will still not heat up. It turns red and no matter how long I wait to let it warm up, it will not heat. When I unlock and pull the trigger, it turns green but no steam. Don’t waste your money on this steamer
Very pleased with the quality of the product. Well thought out , quick to heat up and fabulous accessories. Would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit sceptical about how good this would be but was really surprised. It’s easy to set up and quick to use. The attachments are handy - I especially liked the tool for doing the grout. See ‘after’ photo! I also thought it was good to be able to refill without having to cool down first although the tank size keeps going for about 20-30 mins. Good value for money - would definitely recommend
届いたその日から、すぐに使用でき、気になる汚れを落とす事ができたガスレンジは焦げつき汚れを素早く取る事ができた オーブンレンジは使い始めてから数年ほったらかしでこびりつきが気になっていたが、簡単に落とせたお風呂のドアの汚れが長年気になっていたが、洗剤でもうまく落とせなかったがクリーナーで素早く落とせた電源のコードが硬い仕様だったので、もう少し柔らかいのだとさらに使いやすくなると思った

I was so excited to get this and was not disappointed. It makes cleaning so much easier to clean showers and wood work and stubborn stains . Price was perfect . If you are thinking twice … Don’t ! It’s well worth it ! Comes with many attachments and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great value and immediate 'out of the box' performance
reviews.reviewText: Excellent steam output, super long cable length and several helpful accessories.The flexible hose option helps avoid needing to tip the unit to get at low areas to clean, such as a carpet spillage ! ...and the inclusion of a couple of spare o rings is a nice touch.Unlike our previous cleaner, the ongoing refill ability enabled continuous operation, so particularly helpful to be able to see the remaining water levelLooking forward to using it again !
